LANGUAGE_NAME = PortuguÃªs
LANGUAGE_CODE = pt-BR

[FONTS]
FugazOne-Regular = FugazOne-Regular-PL
Heebo-Black = Heebo-Black-PL
AlfaSlabOne-Regular = AlfaSlabOne-Regular-PL
ArchivoBlack-Regular = ArchivoBlack-Regular-PL
Cour10Bd = Courier10PitchBT-Bold-PL
RAGE = RageItalic-PL
Dosis-SemiBold = Dosis-SemiBold-PL
Dosis-SemiBold LowCase = Dosis-SemiBold-PL
VT323-Regular = VT323-Regular-PL
DroidSerif-Bold = DroidSerif-Bold-PL
PlayfairDisplay-Bold = PlayfairDisplay-Bold-PL
WalterTurncoat-Regular = WalterTurncoat-Regular-PL
BLUEHIGD = BlueHighwayD-Regular-PL

[POSITION_ADJUSTMENTS]
## HUD labels
Contains(GUI/HUD/) & EndsWith(/HUDLabel) = 0,0,0
## Money ATM screen (excluding row elements)
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/MoneyATM/Screen) & !Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0,0
## Fuel ATM screen header
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/FuelATM/Screen) & !Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0,0
## Fuel ATM screen rows
Contains(PERAPORTTI/ATMs/FuelATM/Screen) & Contains(/Row) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0,0
## Teletext TV
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/) = 0,0,0
## TV Chat
Contains(Systems/TV/TVGraphics/CHAT/Generated/Lines) = 0,0,0,0
## Options
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextlabel) = 0,0,0,0.07
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextLabel) = 0,0,0,0.07
Contains(Systems/OptionsMenu) & Contains(/GUITextHeader) = 0,0,0,0.08
## Settings menu
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/302/Texts) & EndsWith(/Data) = 0,0,0
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/302/Texts/Data) & EndsWith(/Bottomline 1) = 0,0,0
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/302/Texts) & EndsWith(/Data 1) = 0,0,0
Contains(Systems/TV/Teletext/VKTekstiTV/PAGES/302/Texts/Data 1) & EndsWith(/Bottomline 1) = 0,0,0
## Fleetari Service Payment Sheet
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment) & EndsWith(ServicePayment/Text) = 0,0,0
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment) & EndsWith(ServicePayment/Text/Text) = 0,0,0
Contains(Sheets/ServicePayment/Line) = 0,0,0
## Unemployment report sheet
Contains(Sheets/UnemployPaper/2) = -0.018,0,0
Contains(Sheets/UnemployPaper/1) = 0,-0.002,0,0.0033
Contains(Sheets/UnemployPaper/4/Location) = 0,-0.002,0,0.0033
Contains(Sheets/UnemployPaper/4/SignatureClear) = 0,0,0,0.0025
## Computer
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/BIOS) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/Text) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/POS/) & EndsWith(/Command) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/text 2) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/BaudRate) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/Software) & EndsWith(/StatusBar) = 0,0,0
Contains(COMPUTER/SYSTEM/TELEBBS/CONLINE) = 0,0,0
